t: Praise*pn the Lord.*s Praise*pn the Lord*s from the heavens; praise*ld him in the heights above.
Praise*ln him, all his angels; praise*ld him, all his heavenly hosts.
Praise*ln him, sun and moon; praise*ld him, all you shining stars.
Praise*ln him, you highest heavens and*ld you waters above the skies.
Let*pn them praise the name of the Lord,*s for*ld at his command they were created,
and*ln he established them for ever and everâ€” he*ld issued a decree that will never pass away.
Praise*pn the Lord*s from the earth, you*ld great sea creatures and all ocean depths,
lightning*ln and hail, snow and clouds, stormy*ld winds that do his bidding,
you*ln mountains and all hills, fruit*ld trees and all cedars,
wild*ln animals and all cattle, small*ld creatures and flying birds,
kings*ln of the earth and all nations, you*ld princes and all rulers on earth,
young*ln men and women, old*ld men and children.
Let*pn them praise the name of the Lord,*s for*ld his name alone is exalted; his*ld splendor is above the earth and the heavens.
And*ln he has raised up for his people a horn, the*ld praise of all his faithful servants, of*ld Israel, the people close to his heart. Praise*pn the Lord.*s
